name: Space Camp demo version
description:
NOTE: If you do not know english please translate :)

I look forward to your criticisms in the this game  community part.

It is demo version,  you can find game bugs,failed game designs 

How to install the game is written in the community section

SPACE CAMP:

Story: Begüm and her friends go to space for space camp, but one night while they are sleeping, the aliens raid the camp and kidnap their friends, Eren can't stop the raid, but a distant shuttle is landed. But time is limited, You must go earth immediately
